title: blank skin shard for almost a month now

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: for almost a month now my shin shards and champion shards have been blank i have FORMATED MY COMPUTER SENSE THEN so this has to be on leagues end. i know one of them is a soraka skin but i cant do anything with it and the other one i have no idea RITO PLZ FIX. also there is no "quick fixes" that i have found from all my google searches. also sorry if the post is a little rude but 100% warranted in my opinion

replies.body:
This could either be a connection issue or a syncing one.  To start off, your quick fix might be to swap back to the legacy client then return to the updated version.

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

I can't blame you for feeling frustrated, I'd be pretty pissed too if I couldn't use my mats.  Let me know if that does the trick for you.
IT WORKED!!! Thanks mom <3 also remember to pack my lunch btw

No problem, dear.  I made your favorite, peanut butter and pickle sandwich!  Kisses!
